title: [W]Reasonable Adjustments
reasonableAdjustments: [W]Do you have a physical, mental or learning disability or health condition that means you need support during the case? (optional)
insetText: [W]We know some people need support to access information and use our services. We call this a reasonable adjustment. Some reasonable adjustments need to be agreed by a judge or HMCTS. You can discuss with the tribunal if your needs change.
bullet1: [W]documents in alternative formats, colours and fonts
bullet2: [W]help with communicating, sight, hearing, speaking and interpretation
bullet3: [W]access and mobility support if a hearing takes place in person
radioNo: [W]No - I do not need any support at this time
